metadata.description: One of the most controversial series in Sci Fi's history is back! Some fans love it, some fans hate it, but one thing's for certain, writer Marc Guggenheim is going to do Galactica 1980 the "right" way! Lives will be lost as the re-imagining of 1980 begins here and unlike anything you've seen before in a Galactica comic book!
metadata.name: Galactica 1980, Vol. 1
